description: The force_first_password_change parameter in SAP HANA specifies whether users are required to change their password after they are created.

queries.name: q_password_policy_force_first_password_change
queries.sql: SELECT VALUE FROM M_PASSWORD_POLICY where PROPERTY = 'force_first_password_change'

actions.description: The parameter force_first_password_change is set to false. This means users are not required to change their password after they are created. The default value for this setting is true, so it is recommended that it be changed to true to enforce password security.

references: SAP HANA Database Checklists and Recommendations,https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_HANA_ONE/102d9916bf77407ea3942fef93a47da8/61662e3032ad4f8dbdb5063a21a7d706.html#force_first_password_change,SAP Note 3230381 - What are the different parameter options available to control password policy in HANA database?,https://me.sap.com/notes/3230381
